name: Two of Cups

numerology.meaning: Two symbolizes connection and cooperation — the dance between self and other, emotion and reflection, love and boundary. It teaches harmony through mutual recognition.

upright: Connection, trust, emotional reciprocity. In practice: focus on feelings, relationships, and emotional honesty. Best move: name what you feel and communicate it cleanly.
reversed: Connection, trust, emotional reciprocity, but blocked or imbalanced. In practice: something in feelings, relationships, and emotional honesty is out of sync. Best move: stop avoiding the feeling or people-pleasing to keep the peace and reset your approach.
guidance: Do: name what you feel and communicate it cleanly. Don’t: avoiding the feeling or people-pleasing to keep the peace.
call_to_action: Send one honest message; ask for what you need.
